title: Poisson几何与丛代数学术研讨会于2025.1.6-1.10举办
content: Conference on Poisson Geometry and Cluster Algebra January 6-10, 2025 Organizers Yanpeng Li (Sichuan University) Yu Li (University of Toronto) Xiaomeng Xu (Peking University) Shizhuo Yu (Nankai University) Contact Information Shizhuo Yu ( 于世卓 ) E-mail ： yusz@nankai.edu.cn Guilai Liu ( 刘贵来 ) E-mail ： liugl@mail.nankai.edu.cn Schedule of Lectures.pdf Registration: 14:00-19:00, January 6, 2025 Place: Jiayuan Hotel ( 南开大学嘉园宾馆 ) Nankai University, 94 Weijin Road, Tianjin, P.R. China Jiayuan Hotel Tel.: +86 22 2350 8089
